meanings: children's book author, children's story writer

vlive.english: "What fairy tale creature would you like to be?"

examples.korean: New arrivals find it hard to assimilate. 발음듣기 새로 오는 사람들은 동화되기 힘들어한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: New arrivals find it hard to assimilate. 발음

examples.korean: Immigrants have been successfully assimilated into the community. 발음듣기 이민자들이 공동체 내에 성공적으로 동화되어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Immigrants have been successfully assimilated into the community. 발음

examples.korean: his assimilation into the community 발음듣기 그의 공동체 속 동화 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: his assimilation into the community 발음

examples.korean: children’s rhymes and stories 발음듣기 (운을 맞춰 지은) 동시와 동화들 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
a romance straight out of a fairy tale 발음듣기 동화에서 바로 따온 사랑 이야기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a romance straight out of a fairy tale 발음
